title: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: Cook pasta. Fry bacon and garlic. Beat eggs with parmesan, salt, and pepper. Mix pasta, bacon, and egg mixture. Serve immediately.

title: Quinoa Salad with Grilled Veggies
description: Cook quinoa. Grill chopped veggies with oil, salt, and pepper. Mix with quinoa and add lemon juice.

title: Apple Tart
description: Preheat oven to 180°C. Spread pastry in tart pan. Slice apples and arrange on pastry. Sprinkle with sugar, cinnamon, and butter. Bake for 30-35 minutes.
